duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide patient care for medical and surgical patients, including pre and post-operative care.
Utilize critical thinking skills to assess, plan, implement, and evaluate patient care.
Administer medications and treatments, and provide wound care as needed.
Collaborate with multidisciplinary teams to ensure comprehensive patient care.
Document patient information and treatment plans accurately and efficiently.
Provide life support and emergency care as required.
Communicate effectively with patients, families, and healthcare team members.
Demonstrate empathy and compassion in patient interactions.
